mean_cn: adj. 有深刻见解的，富有洞察力的
mean_en: having or showing a very clear understanding of something :having or showing insight
word_etyma: insight洞察力 + ful形容词后缀：有…的 → insightful 有洞察力的
short_phrase: an insightful approach to the problem
sentence: Her new and insightful approach to the problem led us to the correct solution.
sentence_trans: 她对这个问题新潮、有深刻见解的处理带领我们找到了正确的解决方法。
